rukus.text: ane je vyakti rahamanani yadathi bedarakari kare, ame tena para eka setana nakki kari da'i'e chi'e, te ja teno mitra bane che
ane te temane margathi roke che ane a loko a ja anumana kare che ke ame satya marga para che
tyam sudhi ke jyare te amari pase avase, to kahese ke kasa! Mari ane tamari vacce purva ane pascima jetalum antara hota, ghano ja kharaba mitra che
ane jyare tame atyacari bani gaya, to ajana divase tamarum bhega tha'i yatanane (halavi karavi), kami labha nahim pahoncade
sum tame baherane sambhalavi sako cho? Athava andhalane marga batavi sako cho ane tene, je spasta rite pathabhrasta che
basa! Jo ame tamane ahinyathi la'i ja'i'e, to pana ame temani sathe badalo la'isum
athava temani sathe je vacana karyum che, te tamane batavi deva mate pana sakti dharavi'e chi'e
Basa! Je vahi tamari tarapha karavamam avi che tene majabutithi pakadi rakho, ni:Sanka tame satya marga para cho
ane ni:Sanka a tamara mate ane tamari koma mate sikhamana che ane najika manja tamane puchavamam avase
ane amara te payagambarone puchi lo, jemane ame tamara karata pahela mokalya hata, ke sum ame rahamana sivaya bija pujyo banavya hata? Jemani bandagi karavamam ave
